# Antek Automation - AI Widget Platform

## About
Antek Automation is an AI automation agency based in the United Kingdom, providing AI chatbots, voice AI phone agents, and workflow automation solutions.

## Services
- AI Chatbots: Intelligent conversational agents for websites and applications
- Voice AI Phone Agents: Automated voice assistants for handling phone calls
- Workflow Automation: Streamlined business processes through AI-powered automation
- Lead Capture: 24/7 automated lead collection and qualification
- Appointment Booking: AI-assisted scheduling and booking systems
- Customer Support: Round-the-clock AI customer service solutions

## Service Area
United Kingdom

## Technology
This platform demonstrates AI-powered voice and chat widgets that can be embedded on any website to provide intelligent customer interactions.

## Usage
The AI widget supports:
- Text-based chat conversations
- Voice-based natural language interactions
- Customizable branding and appearance
- Easy website integration via embed code
